title: K-Elimination (Exact RNS Division)
summary: Exact quotient recovery in RNS with a single modular multiply; replaces 1967 approximation methods with machine-checked Lean4/Coq proofs.

title: GSO-FHE (Bootstrap-Free Bounded Noise)
summary: Noise-bounded RLWE FHE variant using Gram–Schmidt distance to avoid bootstrapping on depth-50 demo circuits.

title: Shadow Entropy (Zero-Cost RNG)
summary: Entropy harvested from discarded RNS quotient signatures; NIST SP 800-22 tested at 284 Mbit/s with no extra compute.

title: Persistent Montgomery Arithmetic
summary: Residue-native Montgomery form retained across pipelines to avoid conversions and speed up CRTBigInt paths.

title: MobiusInt Signed Residues
summary: Signed residue representation enabling symmetric operations without bootstraps in NINE65 neural primitives.

title: Padé Transcendental Engine
summary: Integer-only Padé/CORDIC/AGM transcendentals validated through the exact_transcendentals suite (47/47 tests).

title: MYSTIC V3 Basin Classification
summary: Integer-only chaos basin classifier validated on Harvey 2017, Imelda 2019, and Memorial Day 2015 case studies.

title: Toric Grover Speedup
summary: Toric quantum search variant showing sqrt-N scaling; validation report records 96.13% peak success rate.

title: COSMOS-HD-Neural v0.6.0
summary: Integer-only neural stack with 148 audited tests; package inventory documented in the v0.6.0 audit.

title: Chunked Model Delegation
summary: Local LLM inference via tensor chunking without cloud APIs; validated implementation for constrained devices.

title: MANA-Boosted NINE65 Core
summary: Canonical NINE65 build with MANA/UNHAL acceleration; benchmarks published for encode/decode/encrypt throughput.
